text:
Which do you guys find more aesthetic? in-line `if` blocks or ternary operators?

```julia> c = true
true

julia> x = if c "a" else "b" end
"a"

julia> x = c ? "a" : "b"
"a"```

elements.text: Which do you guys find more aesthetic? in-line

julia> c = true
true

julia> x = if c "a" else "b" end
"a"

julia> x = c ? "a" : "b"
"a"
